//需要發動所有僑居美國，加拿大，英國，歐洲，澳洲等文明國家的香港人接觸你們本區的議員，以類似的方式，協助香港人到聯合國舉辦反送中的公聽投訴會。啟動去聯合國開公聽投訴的國際公約法理依據，我已經在以下的英文信中很清楚的提列出了。當中國和香港的政府統治不代表國民的利益，不尊重UN的承諾和憲章等等，香港人係有絕對的權利去聯合國總部秘書處斥責聯合國秘書處失職和共匪政府的暴政。聯合國和香港都係屬於你們的。在香港的人亦應該去各國領事館，要求他們駐聯合國的機構協助。我呼籲各代前輩，特別係法律界的人協助年輕人籌備籌備//

to the Permanent Mission to the United Nations in New York
466 Lexington Avenue, 20th Floor
New York, NY 10017, USA
Telephone: (1) 212-848-1100
Fax: (1) 212-848-1195
Email: canada.un@international.gc.ca

Attn: XXX

My name is New J.C.Kong. My MP Mr. James Maloney's office has referred me to contact your office to address my concern about Hong Kong's current dire political situation, and the imminent danger young people are facing. They need all peaceful nations and our Government help to present their case in New York to the United Nations with reference to the UN Charter and Covenants. As a constituent of United Nations from Canada, I believe we have the obligation and promises to be delivered to the UN, to help the world and the people of Hong Kong for peace and justice.

My home city Hong Kong currently is also experiencing a dire situation of police force and the ruling regime hiring and deploying gangsters from Fujian Province, carrying out terror attacks at the people and young demonstrators. The Hong Kong regime is also abusing the judicial system ruling the city by fear of selective enforcement of laws and selective prosecution of human rights activists with fabricated evidence. I strongly believed that, part of this problem stems from the UN recognized the official status of the Communist regime for ruling China and Hong Kong without enforcing this brutal regime to honour the obligation to the people of China and the United Nations. It is actually also a global issue of UN ignoring its responsibilities to the People. I wanted to contact the UN Secretariat to discuss the global issues of UN honouring its obligation of the Charter Preamble and International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights. And also return UN to the people; return the sovereignty of all member states to the people, such as the republic state of Hong Kong, China.

This is my third times trying to contact UN to raise the similar above issues. The first time is about the Indigenous people's rights, the second time is regarding the horrible stories of sex trade criminals kidnapping children along the Migrant Caravan on route to USA.

I am the volunteer that helped the Indigenous people to obtain the approval of the National Fire Marshal's office and other agencies to allow Indigenous people to practice Sacred Fires ceremony and other tradition cultural activities outside their reserves. I explained to the city and provincial agencies that the various Indigenous ceremonies and sacred fires will not violate the legislation and by-laws' safety purposes with reference to the engineering principles adopted by the authorities having jurisdiction. During the period of helping the Indigenous people to exercise their rights to practise their traditions in the city parks and open spaces, I had a chance to learn about and understand the United Nations. United Nations is no longer an International People's organization any more, but becoming a flea market for brutal ruling regimes shopping for their global recognition and the power for ruling their people with fear. This is inconsistent with the UN Charter Preamble and the UN, the people established.

The people of Hong Kong needed our help to reach United Nations to present their case at the premises of UN head quarter in New York, and to the world that we have promised with reference to the Preamble and the criteria to join the UN.

Best Regards

JC
